mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription(subscription_id, userid, solution_id, service_type, storage_capacity, user_count, subscription_period, company_name, address, detail_address, phone_number ) VALUES(subscription_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{solutionId}, #{serviceType}, #{storageCapacity}, #{userCount}, #{subscriptionPeriod}, #{companyName}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{phoneNumber} )
mapper.select: select subscription_id, userid, solution_id, service_type, storage_capacity, user_count, subscription_period, TO_CHAR(subscription_date, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') as subscription_date, NVL(company_name,'회사명 미입력'), NVL(address,'주소 미입력'), NVL(detail_address,'상세주소 미입력'), NVL(phone_number,'전화번호 미입력') from subscription subs join users u on subs.userid = u.id where subs.userid = #{userId} and u.subscribed = '1'
